sentences.en: Bidding results comprise multitudinous and intricacy effective factors. Analysing is difficult for its fuzzy information.
sentences.cn: 影响工程项目投标竞争结果的因素众多、复杂, 并且具有不同程度的模糊性,分析困难.

sentences.en: Even the most complicated computer man has yet built can't compare in intricacy with the brain.
sentences.cn: 即便人类所发明的迄今最为复杂的电脑都无法与人脑的复杂性相比.

sentences.en: The best designs, however , are those strong and simple forms which exclude intricacy.
sentences.cn: (这句翻得不好)最好的设计是震撼性的简单的形式而非复杂繁琐.
私人银行业务的错综复杂

sentences.en: The intricacy of a farmer or the innocence of an intellectual, the cunningness of a white-collar or the character of a laid-off female worker could all be discerned through certain details.
sentences.cn: 农民的复杂和知识分子的单纯,白领的狡猾和下岗女工的德行,都能从细节上甄别出某种做人的基本质地。

sentences.en: The intricacy of the structure may be caused in part by material ejected from a binary central star, but as yet, there is no direct evidence that the central star has a companion.
sentences.cn: 其复杂的结构可能部分由二元中心星喷射的物质产生，但是至今还没有直接的证据表明存在两个中心星。

sentences.en: The price depends on the intricacy of the work.
sentences.cn: 价格取决于做工的复杂精细度。

sentences.en: The work shows a suitable interplay of scope of inquiry and intricacy of discussion.
sentences.cn: 作业展示出质询之范畴和讨论复杂性之间适合的相互影响.

sentences.en: Therefore the demands on crisis managers are rising too proportionally with the intricacy of the situation.
sentences.cn: 因此,对危机管理的需求也不断上升,比例随着形势错综复杂.

trans.tran_cn: 错综复杂，（因复杂而产生的）难以理解，（常复数）错综复杂的事物
